text: Adam Nyerere Bahner (born May 21, 1982), often called by the pseudonym Tay Zonday, is an American keyboardist. His song "Chocolate Rain", and its YouTube video, became a popular Internet meme in July 2007. He has won YouTube Awards and Webby Awards. ==References== ==Other websites== * Tay Zonday's website * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Minneapolis Category:American Internet celebrities
title: Tay Zonday
